fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, disguise yourself as any Blu team role.
- Backstab a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The color of this role in the bot is #FF0000.
- If a player dies, their cause of death appears to be the Blu role you're disguised as.
- Blu team players will see you as a Blu  team member. Red team players will still see you as a Red team member.
